review:
I am really thankful to Dr.Rajshree Joshi *** ****** **** ********* ** ** ***** My both kids were allergic to dust, *** ***** ******* ****** ******** * **** ********* **  ******** both kids are fit & fine.
Dr. Joshi is very softspoken & sincere to her work.
I am glad that my kids are in safe hands.

My name is Aditya & my daughter name is Aashrita she is now 1year & 9 month old. Dr.rajashree always gives 200% to their each patient and whenever my daughter become ill Dr.Rajashree has took care of her & prescribed best medicine. Very down to earth person and aim is to heal the patient quickly. good human being always helped us whenever my daughter was ill. Even in Covid19 Situation she was serving and gave the timely vaccination to my daughter. *** ** *** **** ****** ** ******* Thank you madam for dedication & continues support to all.
reply_text: Thanks Mr Aditya Tembekar, for the response. Will continue to serve the humanity.
